statements: DELETE FROM endangered_species WHERE species_id = 100 AND habitat_id = 1;
DELETE FROM endangered_species WHERE habitat_name = 'Forest' AND habitat_location = 'POINT(40.7128, -74.0060)';
DELETE FROM endangered_species WHERE location = ST_GeomFromText('POINT(47.6062 -122.3321)', 4326);
DELETE FROM distribution WHERE species_id = 1 AND habitat_id = 2;
DELETE FROM spatial_information WHERE habitat_id = 3 AND latitude > 45.0;
DELETE FROM species WHERE species_id = 10 AND habitat_id = 1;
DELETE FROM species_habitats WHERE species_id = 456 AND habitat_id = 789;
